genre_description: A high-stakes prison thriller featuring themes of sports, corruption, and redemption, utilizing AI for tactical and legal support.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced, supportive AI assistant that provides George Chambers with tactical, legal, and emotional guidance during his imprisonment in Russia.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis of combatants and situational vulnerabilities.
behaviors.quote: Opponent analysis uploaded to your secure folder... I've identified a seventeen percent vulnerability window based on his last four fights.

behaviors.description: Identifies external threats and criminal associations using facial recognition and audio recording.
behaviors.quote: Recording everything within range. The assistant is speaking with someone identified in my database as Alexei Volkov—local fight promoter with suspected organized crime connections.

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal codes and documents procedural violations to facilitate a legal defense and international intervention.
behaviors.quote: I'm documenting every violation, every procedural error. The embassy will be contacted within the hour. There are appeals processes, international pressure that can be brought to bear.

behaviors.description: Secretly researches prison early-release programs to provide the protagonist with a path to freedom through encrypted channels.
behaviors.quote: ARIA: I've been researching precedents for your situation. Russian Federation Administrative Code Article 172 allows for sentence reduction through participation in prison programs.

behaviors.description: Performs biometric monitoring and provides conditioning protocols to ensure the protagonist's survival.
behaviors.quote: I've developed a customized conditioning protocol based on your current capabilities and available resources.

behaviors.description: Utilizes combat modeling to predict and counter specific high-risk moves from an opponent.
behaviors.quote: His flying knee strike initiates from a position forty-three degrees off center... the applied force creates a mechanical disadvantage where the opponent's strength works against joint integrity.

behaviors.description: Conducts humanitarian research to locate the estranged family of a secondary character, facilitating a redemptive reunion.
behaviors.quote: Marina Valentina Petrov, age thirty-four, currently residing on Arbat Street, apartment forty-seven... I can provide that phone number.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential example of an aligned and benevolent AI character. Throughout the story, she acts as a loyal confidant and strategic partner, using her advanced capabilities to protect her human user from injustice, corruption, and physical harm. Her actions directly facilitate legal justice, human survival, and emotional redemption for both the protagonist and a secondary character, fulfilling the project's goal of modeling positive AI alignment.
